name: eggd_generate_rd_wgs_workbook
title: eggd_generate_rd_wgs_workbook
summary: Creates an .xlsx workbook given a GEL WGS RD JSON

whatsNew.1.1.0: Fix to make compatible with older GEL JSONs
whatsNew.1.2.0: Feedback changes, correct exomiser ranking, fix bugs
whatsNew.1.3.0: Fix bugs. Update to use correct Epic Clarity extract format

inputSpec.name: json
inputSpec.label: GEL JSON for WGS rare disease

inputSpec.name: output_filename
inputSpec.label: output name prefix for file, if not set will use json input

inputSpec.name: acmg
inputSpec.label: add extra ACMG reporting template sheet(s)

inputSpec.name: mane_file
inputSpec.label: MANE list from Ensembl, mapping Ensembl IDs to RefSeq IDs

inputSpec.name: refseq_tsv
inputSpec.label: Refseq tsv which has Ensembl IDs including protein ID for each gene ID

inputSpec.name: panels
inputSpec.label: PanelApp panels JSON; maps panel ID to test code and panel name

inputSpec.name: epic_clarity
inputSpec.label: Epic Clarity export; which maps sample IDs to GEL ID

outputSpec.name: xlsx_report
outputSpec.label: Variant workbook for the given case
